thumb.title: 【驚異の１枚コンボ】やっべ、ゆかりさんの立ち絵入れ忘れてたわ【The SPY】
thumb.description: １枚コンボはコンボなのか？という疑問は尽きませんDeck4 Balustrade Spy (J25) 4024 Eldritch Evolution (SIR) 1954 Sylvan Caryatid (PIO) 1962 Progenitus (FDN) 2443 Surgical Extraction (OTP) 193 Disciple of Freyalise (MH3) 2504 Boggart Trawler (MH3) 2434 Creeping Chill (GRN) 664 Turntimber Symbiosis (ZNR) 2154 Bridgeworks Battle (MH3) 2494 Silversmote Ghoul (M21) 1223 Narcomoeba (GRN) 474 Prized Amalgam (SIR) 2404 Paradise Druid (SPG) 04 Fell the Profane (MH3) 2443 Tangled Florahedron (ZNR) 2111 Haunted Dead (SIR) 1171 Darksteel Colossus (FDN) 671
thumb.last_res_body: 何！？スパイは１... うぽつ シングルマリガン(... うぽつ 生きがい
